00020 require 'simbio_isis_result.inc.php';
00021 
00033 class simbio_isis extends simbio
00034 {
00035     var $db_name = '';
00036     var $res_conn = 0;
00037     var $isis_opt = '-v error -format aligned -encoding ISO8859_1';
00038 
00044     function simbio_isis($str_dbname)
00045     {
00046         $this->db_name = $str_dbname;
00047         // execute connection
00048         $this->connect();
00049     }
00050 
00051 
00057     function connect()
00058     {
00059         $open = @isis_open($this->db_name, $this->isis_opt);
00060         if ($open) {
00061             $this->res_conn = $open;
00062         } else {
00063             $this->error = "Can't make connection to ".strtoupper($this->isis_db)." ISIS database";
00064             parent::showError(true);
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00076     function query($str_query = '', $str_query_type = 'query')
00077     {
00078         if (empty($str_query)) {
00079             $this->error = 'Cant send ISIS query because query was empty';
00080             parent::showError(true);
00081         } else {
00082             $_result = new simbio_isis_result($str_query, $str_query_type, $this->res_conn);
00083             // return the result object
00084             if ($this->error) {
00085                 return false;
00086             } else {
00087                 return $_result;
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00098     public function close()
00099     {
00100         @isis_close($this->res_conn);
00101     }
00102 }
00103 ?>
